SEARCH
Package simpledb

Class TupleIterator

java.lang.Object
simpledb.TupleIterator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, DbIterator
public class TupleIterator extends Object implements DbIterator
Implements a DbIterator by wrapping an Iterable.
See Also:

    • close

      public void close()
      Description copied from interface: DbIterator
      Closes the iterator. When the iterator is closed, calling next(), hasNext(), or rewind() should fail by throwing IllegalStateException.
      Specified by:
      close in interface DbIterator
